author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Is it April fools day already? I don’t get out much and every day seems the same in lockdown.

author: Willy
content:
The need for the superstructure is in my opinion what killed it. The use orf ropes across the keel to pull the bags down or back out would have neen more appropriate.

It is a interesting story just the same. Thankyou Rick
